name: v-lock-ui
description: A Vue library that empowers developers to easily integrate secure and user-friendly password-related UI components into their applications.

scripts.build:style: sass --no-charset ./src/styles/index.scss | node ./build/print-banner.js > dist/v-lock-ui-library.css && cleancss -o dist/v-lock-ui-library.min.css dist/v-lock-ui-library.css
scripts.build:lib: rimraf dist && npm run build:vue && npm run build:style

author: Yousif N. Abbas
